title: BRIEF-General Communication ‍Is Imposing SOX Blackout Period During Week Of March 5
text:
09 PM / in 12 minutes BRIEF-General Communication ‍Is Imposing SOX Blackout Period During Week Of March 5 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - General Communication Inc: 
* GENERAL COMMUNICATION - ‍IS IMPOSING SOX BLACKOUT PERIOD THAT IS EXPECTED TO BEGIN DURING WEEK OF MARCH 5, AND END DURING WEEK FOLLOWING REORGANIZATION​ 
* GENERAL COMMUNICATION - BLACKOUT PERIOD RELATED TO DEALS IN WHICH LIBERTY INTERACTIVE WILL BUY CO THROUGH REORGANIZATION FOLLOWED BY SPLIT-OFF Source text : ( bit.ly/2EbEtgU )
